actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act with respect to refusals to bargain.

summary.text: Provides that complaints under the National Labor Relations Act with respect to refusals to bargain shall allege a refusal by the employer to bargain collectively with the representative of his employees other than such a refusal where the representative has not been certified under such Act within the twelve month period preceding such refusal. (Amends 29 U.S.C. 158(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act with respect to refusals to bargain.
